title: Netflix
subtitle: TV & Film
exec: bash -lc "B=$(command -v chromium-browser || command -v chromium || command -v google-chrome || command -v brave-browser); exec \"$B\" --app=https://www.netflix.com/browse --kiosk --user-data-dir=$HOME/.config/htpcvibes/chrome-netflix"
